   19: 
   20: -module(sigils_SUITE).
   21: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   22: 	 init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2,
   23: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2]).
   24: 
   25: -export([compiled_sigils/1, scan_sigils/1, parse_sigils/1]).
   26: 
   27: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   28: 
   29: all() ->
   30:     [compiled_sigils, scan_sigils, parse_sigils].
   31: 
   32: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
   33:     Config.
   34: %%
   35: end_per_testcase(_Case, _Config) ->
   36:     ok.
   37: 
   38: groups() -> [].
   39: %%
   40: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   41:     Config.
   42: %%
   43: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   44:     Config.
   45: 
   46: 
   47: suite() ->
   48:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   49:      {timetrap,{seconds,30}}].
   50: %%
   51: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   52:     Config.
   53: %%
   54: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   55:     ok.
   56: 
   57: %% #########################################################################
   58: 
   59: compiled_sigils(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   60:     QB = <<"ab\"c\"\d"/utf8>>, % Quoted Binary
   61:     QB = ~"ab\"c\"\d",
   62:     QB = ~b"ab\"c\"\d",
   63:     QB = ~b"""
   64:           ab"c"\d
   65:           """,
   66:     VB = <<"ab\"c\"\\d"/utf8>>, % Verbatim Binary
   67:     VB = ~B"ab\"c\"\d",
   68:     VB = ~"""
   69:           ab"c"\d
   70:           """,
   71:     VB = ~B"""
   72:           ab"c"\d
   73:           """,
   74:     %%
   75:     QS = "ab\"c\"\d", % Quoted String
   76:     QS = ~s"ab\"c\"\d",
   77:     QS = ~s"""
   78:           ab"c"\d
   79:           """,
   80:     VS = "ab\"c\"\\d", % Verbatim String
   81:     VS = ~S"ab\"c\"\d",
   82:     VS = ~S""""
   83:           ab"c"\d
   84:           """",
   85:     %%
   86:     case "abc" of
   87:         ~s"abc" -> ok
   88:     end,
   89:     (fun (~B"abc") -> ok end)(<<"abc"/utf8>>),
   90:     ok.
   91: 
   92: %% #########################################################################
   93: 
   94: scan_sigils(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   95:     [begin
   96:         {S,_,_,T} = Spec,
   97:          P1 = pos(element(2, Spec)),
   98:          P2 = pos(element(3, Spec)),
   99:          {_, {error,{P1,erl_scan,{string,T,_}},P2}} =
  100:              {Spec, erl_scan:string(S, {1,1}, [])}
  101:      end ||
  102:         Spec <-
  103:             [{"\"",1,2,$"},
  104:              {"\"x",1,3,$"},
  105:              {"\"\"\"",1,4,{$",3}},
  106:              {"\"\"\"\n",1,{2,1},{$",3}},
  107:              {"~\"",2,3,$"},
  108:              {"~\"x",2,4,$"},
  109:              {"~\"\"\"\"",2,6,{$",4}},
  110:              {"~\"\"\"\"\n",2,{2,1},{$",4}},
  111:              {"~s\"",3,4,$"},
  112:              {"~s\"x",3,5,$"},
  113:              {"~s\"\"\"",3,6,{$",3}},
  114:              {"~s\"\"\"\n",3,{2,1},{$",3}},
  115:              {"~S\"",3,4,$"},
  116:              {"~S\"x",3,5,$"},
  117:              {"~S\"\"\"",3,6,{$",3}},
  118:              {"~S\"\"\"\nxx",3,{2,3},{$",3}}]],
  119:     [begin
  120:         {S,_,_} = Spec,
  121:          P1 = pos(element(2, Spec)),
  122:          P2 = pos(element(3, Spec)),
  123:          {_, {error,{P1,erl_scan,{illegal,string}},P2}} =
  124:              {Spec, erl_scan:string(S, {1,1}, [])}
  125:      end ||
  126:         Spec <-
  127:             [{"~",2,2}, {"~ ",2,2}, {"~_",3,3}, {"~_ ",3,3}]],
  128:     %%
  129:     AtomSize = 255,
  130:     IllegalAtomString = lists:duplicate(AtomSize+1, $a),
  131:     EndPos1 = 2+AtomSize+1,
  132:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,sigil_prefix}},{1,EndPos1}} =
  133:         erl_scan:string("~"++IllegalAtomString, {1,1}, []),
  134:     EndPos2 = 4+AtomSize+1,
  135:     {error,{{1,4},erl_scan,{illegal,sigil_suffix}},{1,EndPos2}} =
  136:         erl_scan:string("~\"\""++IllegalAtomString, {1,1}, []),
  137:     ok.
  138: 
  139: 
  140: pos({R,C} = Pos) when is_integer(R), is_integer(C) -> Pos;
  141: pos(C) when is_integer(C) -> {1,C}.
  142: 
  143: %% #########################################################################
  144: 
  145: parse_sigils(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  146:     {ok, <<"ab\"c\d"/utf8>>, {1,12}} =
  147:         parse_term(
  148:           """
  149:           ~"ab\"c\d".
  150:           """),
  151:     %%
  152:     IllegalPrefix = "illegal sigil prefix.",
  153:     IllegalSuffix = "illegal sigil suffix.",
  154:     AllSigils = [" ~","~s","~S","~b","~B"],
  155:     [{_, {error,{1,1},erl_parse,IllegalPrefix,{2,5}}} =
  156:          {String, parse_term("~_"++String)}
  157:      || String <-
  158:             [""""
  159:              "
  160:                 "
  161:              """",
  162:              """"
  163:              """
  164:               """
  165:              """"]],
  166:     %%
  167:     [{_, {error,{1,8},erl_parse,IllegalSuffix,{1,9}}} =
  168:          {Prefix, parse_term(Prefix++"\"abc\"x")}
  169:      || Prefix <- AllSigils],
  170:     %%
  171:     [{_, {error,{3,6},erl_parse,IllegalSuffix,{3,7}}} =
  172:          {Prefix,
  173:           parse_term(
  174:             Prefix++""""
  175:                 """
  176:                   abc
  177:                   """x
  178:                 """")}
  179:      || Prefix <- AllSigils],
  180:     %%
  181:     [{_, {error,{3,7},erl_parse,"syntax error before: \"\"",{3,9}}} =
  182:          {Prefix,
  183:           parse_term(
  184:             Prefix++""""
  185:                 """
  186:                   abc
  187:                   """ ""
  188:                 """")}
  189:      || Prefix <- AllSigils],
  190:     %%
  191:     [{_, {error,{{3,6},erl_scan,string_concat},{3,6}}} =
  192:          {Prefix,
  193:           erl_scan:string(
  194:             Prefix++"""""
  195:                 """
  196:                   abc
  197:                   """"
  198:                 """"", {1,1}, [])}
  199:      || Prefix <- AllSigils],
  200:     [{_, {error,{{1,8},erl_scan,string_concat},{1,8}}} =
  201:          {Prefix,
  202:           erl_scan:string(
  203:             Prefix++"""
  204:                 "abc""
  205:                 """,
  206:             {1,1}, [])}
  207:      || Prefix <- AllSigils],
  208:     ok.
  209: 
  210: parse_term(String) ->
  211:     {ok,Tokens,EndPos} = erl_scan:string(String, {1,1}, []),
  212:     case erl_parse:parse_term(Tokens) of
  213:         {ok, Parsed} ->
  214:             {ok, Parsed, EndPos};
  215:         {error, {Pos,Mod,Str}} ->
  216:             {error, Pos, Mod, lists:flatten(Str), EndPos}
  217:     end.
